title: Changelog
description: Keep up to date with Paxos Platform changes.

items.content_html:
• v2 API: Add optional crypto_tx_hashes filter to the List Transfers endpoint.
  • v2 API: Add the following document types to Identity Documents APIs: AML_DOCUMENTS, FUND_STRUCTURE_CHART, FUND_MANAGER_REGISTRATION, MEMORANDUM_OF_ASSOCIATION, ORGANIZATIONAL_CHART, FOUNDATION_BY_LAWS, APPOINTMENT_OF_GUARDIAN_EVIDENCE, LEGAL_DOMICILE_OF_BENEFICIAL_OWNERS, GOVERNING_BODY_MEMBER_NAMES.
items.title: October 2, 2024
items.summary: - v2 API: Add optional cryptotxhashes filter to the List Transfers endpoint.

items.content_html:
• v2 API: Add three new optional fields to the customer_due_diligence object of the Identity API (Create Identity and Update Identity).
  • v2 API: Add new ENUM value GOVERNMENT_BENEFITS to the customer_due_diligence object field source_of_funds in the Identity API (Create Identity and Update Identity).
items.title: September 25, 2024
items.summary: - v2 API: Add three new optional fields to the customerduediligence object of the Identity API (Create Identity and Update Identity).

items.content_html: • v2 API: Add is_merchant field to the Identity API (Update Identity, Get Identity, List Identities).
items.title: September 19, 2024
items.summary: - v2 API: Add is_merchant field to the Identity API (Update Identity, Get Identity, List Identities).

items.content_html: • v2 API: Updated rate limit on Identity API from 50 to 10 requests per second.
items.title: September 16, 2024
items.summary: - v2 API: Updated rate limit on Identity API from 50 to 10 requests per second.

items.content_html: • Docs, v2 API: Add new Settlement APIs which allow for atomic one-way or two-way transfers across Paxos accounts. Also added Settlement integration guide.
items.title: August 27, 2024
items.summary: - Docs, v2 API: Add new Settlement APIs which allow for atomic one-way or two-way transfers across Paxos accounts. Also added Settlement integration guide.

items.content_html: • FIX: Enforce a maximum of 150 messages per second, per session.
items.title: July 24, 2024
items.summary: - FIX: Enforce a maximum of 150 messages per second, per session.

items.content_html: • v2 API: All metadata specified when creating a crypto deposit address is now inherited by deposit activities.
items.title: June 26, 2024
items.summary: - v2 API: All metadata specified when creating a crypto deposit address is now inherited by deposit activities.

items.content_html: • Funding: Paxos is upgrading its wallet infrastructure, impacting customers' crypto deposit addresses for BTC, ETH, BCH, LTC and all ERC20 tokens. This planned change is part of our commitment to continuous product and security improvements. Users will be required to retrieve the new crypto deposit address via the UI or CreateDepositAddress API no earlier than February 15, 2024, and no later than June 13, 2024. Old deposit addresses will come with a deprecated warning until June 13, 2024. After this date they will no longer be supported.
items.title: June 13, 2024
items.summary: - Funding: Paxos is upgrading its wallet infrastructure, impacting customers' crypto deposit addresses for BTC, ETH, BCH, LTC and all ERC20 tokens. This planned change is part of our commitment to continuous product and security improvements. Users will be required to retrieve the new crypto deposit address via the UI or CreateDepositAddress API no earlier than February 15, 2024, and no later than June 13, 2024. Old deposit addresses will come with a deprecated warning until June 13, 2024. After this date they will no longer be supported.

items.content_html: • Docs, v2 API: Enable PYUSD on Solana. Update PYUSD docs with mainnet and testnet addresses.
items.title: May 29, 2024
items.summary: - Docs, v2 API: Enable PYUSD on Solana. Update PYUSD docs with mainnet and testnet addresses.
